Memo

Class MemoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Memo.MemoManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MemoManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that contains and interacts with memos' ids, memos objects and events' ids
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • associateMemoToEvent

        public void associateMemoToEvent(Memo memo,
                                 java.lang.String eID)
        Takes a memo and associates it to event NOTE: at most one memos can be associated to an event and many events to a memo. if an event already has a memo, this function will overwrite it and delete the old
        Parameters:
        eID - the ID of the Event to be associated with the memor
        memo - the String contained in the memo

      • deleteMemo

        public void deleteMemo(java.lang.String mID)
        will remove a memo from existance and delete all assocations of it to events
        Parameters:
        mID - the ID of the memo you are to delete

      • updateMemo

        public void updateMemo(java.lang.String mID,
                       java.lang.String newText)
        Allows for modification of a memo
        Parameters:
        mID - The ID of the Memo.Memo you want to modify
        newText - the text the memo will be updated to

      • getEventIDsByMemoID

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEventIDsByMemoID(java.lang.String MemoID)
        Since one memo can be associated to many events This funciton will find all the events (IDs) for a givin memoID
        Parameters:
        MemoID - The ID of the memo that you are trying to find event with
        Returns:
        List of all event IDs that are associated to the memo.

      • getAllMemos

        public java.util.List<Memo> getAllMemos()
        Getter for all memos in the manager
        Returns:
        A set of all the memos in the Manager
